About 20 Mcternan Unit 203

Great location across from lovely Dana Park and blocks from dynamic Central Square and the Charles River. Airy, twelve foot ceiling and nine foot windows facing Dana park let the morning sun in. Gleaming hardwood floors, luxurious wool bedroom carpet and natural tiles in kitchen and bath. Recently updated kitchen, tiled shower in bathroom and laundry appliances make the unit truly move-in ready. Association has secure garage parking, secure storage area, a fully equipped fitness gym, outdoor and indoor bike parking, function room with kitchen & restrooms in addition to common outdoor space on ground and third floor deck. Converted from an elementary school in 2008, this boutique association has been well loved by owners and renters alike. Visit and see what makes the Association so special.
